edits.text: ║         WAYBAR STYLING - BLUE THEME WITH BLUR          ║
║        ROFI LAUNCHER THEME - BLUE WITH BLUR            ║
font-family: "JetBrains Mono", "Noto Sans Arabic", "Symbols Nerd Font";
║        ROFI POWERMENU THEME - BLUE WITH BLUR           ║
; Height of the bars (in number of characters)
font_family = JetBrains Mono, Noto Sans Arabic
bind = $mainMod, D, exec, rofi -show drun -theme /home/ali/example\ config/.config/rofi/launcher.rasi
bind = $mainMod, X, exec, rofi -show run -theme /home/ali/example\ config/.config/rofi/launcher.rasi
bind = $mainMod, V, exec, cliphist list | rofi -dmenu -theme /home/ali/example\ config/.config/rofi/launcher.rasi | cliphist decode | wl-copy
bind = $mainMod SHIFT, PRINT, exec, grim -g "$(slurp)" - | swappy -f -
bindl = , XF86AudioMute, exec, wpctl set-mute @DEFAULT_AUDIO_SINK@ toggle
bindl = , XF86AudioMicMute, exec, wpctl set-mute @DEFAULT_AUDIO_SOURCE@ toggle
font_family = JetBrains Mono, Noto Sans Arabic
# Close the notification window with history pop down (which is currently not supported by the notification center)
# Skip the notification on the taskbar
# Settings for the center and right click
# Source this file in your ~/.bashrc or ~/.zshrc or ~/.config/fish/config.fish
cliphist list | rofi -dmenu -theme "$THEME_DIR/launcher.rasi" -p "Clipboard" | cliphist decode | wl-copy
echo "Error: cliphist not installed. Install with: sudo pacman -S cliphist"
# Create directory if it doesn't exist
# Optional: Start a background music player
بيئة تجريبية احترافية لـ Hyprland مع ثيم أزرق جميل وتأثيرات blur متقدمة.
echo "║   HYPRLAND BLUE THEME - AUTOMATIC SETUP SCRIPT       ║"
# This file documents recommended GTK and Qt settings
$INSTALL hyprland hyprlock waybar rofi dunst kitty cava \
# Custom function to quickly open rofi launcher
- ✨ Blur effect على جميع الواجهات (size: 8-10 pixels)
Super + Shift + P   → Screenshot منطقة معينة
Super + H/J/K/L     → التنقل بين النوافذ (Vim keys)
Super + Ctrl + H/J/K/L  → تغيير حجم النوافذ
Super + Shift + 1-5 → نقل النافذة للـ Workspace
Super + Shift + TAB → الـ Workspace السابق
sudo pacman -S hyprland hyprlock waybar rofi dunst kitty cava \
brightnessctl wpctl grim slurp swappy wl-clipboard cliphist
sudo apt install hyprland hyprlock waybar rofi dunst kitty cava \
brightnessctl pulseaudio-utils grim slurp wl-clipboard wl-paste
sudo dnf install hyprland hyprlock waybar rofi dunst kitty cava \
brightnessctl pulseaudio-utils grim slurp wl-clipboard wl-paste
- `~/.config/hypr/hyprland.conf` - بحث عن `#0088ff` و استبدل بالوني المفضل
- تأكد من دعم GPU الخاص بك للـ blur
جرب تغيير الخط أو تقليل حجم الـ blur:
3. احفظ لقطات الشاشة بصيغة PNG للحصول على أفضل جودة
4. جرب مدير النوافذ (Super+J) للتبديل بين Dwindle و Master layouts
read -p "Download Papirus icon theme and Bibata cursor? [y/n] " -n 1 -r
echo "  3. Use Super+D to open application launcher"
echo "  4. Use Super+ENTER to open terminal"
echo "📖 Documentation: See ${YELLOW}README.md${NC} for full details"
echo "🔷 Welcome to Hyprland Blue Theme!"
echo "   Type 'launcher' to open app menu"
# ║        Include in hyprland.conf for best results       ║
# under the [general] section for optimal performance
# For slow systems, reduce blur and disable some effects:
windowrulev2 = float, class:^(nautilus|thunar|pcmanfm)$, title:^(Confirm|Move Files|Copy Files)$
# You can add wget command here to download a default wallpaper
windowrulev2 = float, class:^(gimp)$, title:^(GNU Image Manipulation Program)$
echo "║   1. Logout from your current desktop             ║"
echo "║   3. Or run: startx hyprland (from TTY)           ║"
# Optional: Reduce monitor polling for power saving
echo "║   • Super + D = Open app launcher                 ║"
echo "║   • Read README.md for full documentation          ║"
**Problem:** Screen stays black after selecting Hyprland
# Try starting from TTY without Display Manager
**Problem:** Blur is disabled or not visible
read -p "Enter backup filename to restore: " BACKUP_FILE
Super + Shift + 1-5  Move window to workspace
# For NVIDIA cards, may need additional drivers
**Problem:** Rofi looks wrong or has wrong colors
3. Split windows: Super + J to toggle split
4. Use workspaces: Super+1 for dev, Super+2 for docs
3. Keep on workspace 4: Files → Window Rules
**Pro Tip:** Save this file as a quick reference in your home directory!
hyprctl reload 2>/dev/null || echo -e "${YELLOW}Note: Reload Hyprland manually to see changes${NC}"
echo -e "${GREEN}Done! Your Hyprland theme is now customized.${NC}"
echo -e "${YELLOW}Tip: Use 'hyprctl reload' to reload without restarting${NC}"
# Then use freesync or gsync in your GPU drivers
# In hyprland.conf, use gradients for borders:
hyprctl keyword layout dwindle preserve_split yes
bind = $mainMod SHIFT, V, exec, rofi -show vpn -theme ~/.config/rofi/launcher.rasi
bind = $mainMod, Z, exec, hyprctl dispatch fullscreen 1
# Add script for blue light filter:
**Remember:** Always backup your config before trying advanced modifications!
# 🔷 Hyprland Blue Theme - Complete Project Index
هذا المجلد يحتوي على إعدادات كاملة واحترافية لبيئة Hyprland مع ثيم أزرق حديث وتأثيرات blur جميلة.
الملف الأساسي لكل إعدادات نافذة الماناجر
✨ **Blur Effects** - تأثيرات Blur سلسة وخفيفة على الأداء
💅 **Consistent Theme** - ثيم موحد عبر جميع التطبيقات
⚡ **Optimized** - أداء ممتاز حتى على الأجهزة الضعيفة
2. **نظم Workspaces**: استخدم كل workspace لمهمة معينة
4. **Back up config**: احفظ backup قبل التعديل
هل لديك تحسينات أو نصائح؟ شارك مع المجتمع! 🚀
هذا المشروع مجاني ومتاح للاستخدام الشخصي والتجاري.
# ║     HYPRLAND BLUE THEME - COMPLETE SETUP SCRIPT      ║
echo "This wizard will install a complete Hyprland setup with:"
echo -e "${GREEN}✓${NC} No existing configuration to backup"
# Add environment variables if not already present
echo -e "${MAGENTA}║${NC}  🎉 Hyprland Blue Theme is ready to use!         ${MAGENTA}║${NC}"
echo "     1. Logout from your current session"
echo "     3. Press Super+D to open app launcher"
echo "     4. Press Super+Enter to open terminal"
